mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM TRADE_PURCHASE_SUGGEST WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT T.id AS tradeId , T.user_id , T.status , U.nickname AS userNickname , T.file_id , F.file_url , T.created_at , GI.gacha_id , GI.id AS gachaItemId , GI.name AS gachaItemName , PS.id AS suggestId , PS.content , PS.count , PS.discount_yn , PS.discount_price , PS.created_at FROM TRADE_PURCHASE_SUGGEST PS LEFT JOIN TRADE T ON T.id = PS.trade_id LEFT JOIN USER U ON U.id = T.user_id LEFT JOIN IMAGE_FILE F ON F.file_id = T.file_id LEFT JOIN GACHA_ITEM GI ON GI.id = PS.gacha_item_id WHERE PS.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY PS.created_at DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
